course_title: Special Topics in NBB: Human Learning & Memory
class_notes:
(Same as PSYC 302 1)
Freshmen are not allowed to take this class.  Prior completion of PSYC 110, 111, or AP/IB credit in psychology or NBB intro courses equivalent.
course_description: Study of variable topics of special interest in neuroscience and behavioral biology. May be repeated for credit when topics vary.
schedule_location: MW 1pm-2:15pm in New Psyc Bldg 230 (36 Eagle Ro
